main:keys.text:
1) Check that internet works without VPN.
2) In the app, click the "speedometer" icon and check connection with each location.
3) If problem persists, request a new key from support @modern_1mctech

main:renew.text:
Subscription can be renewed via bot @LockDown_VPN_Bbot.
Click "Home" â†’ "Get subscription". Choose subscription period, payment method, who the subscription is for and pay.
After successful payment your keys will be extended, no need to add them again.

main:invite.text:
Open bot @LockDown_VPN_Bbot â†’ Home â†’ Invite friend.
Copy the invitation link and send it to the person.

install:ios.text: 1) Open App Store and install Happ app - install link. 2) Copy your subscription in "My subscription" section 3) In Happ app click "Paste from clipboard" 4) Congratulations, subscription added! Clicking "speedometer" icon you can check connection speed with each location. Where value is lower - that location works better currently 5) Choose location and click connect.

install:android.text: 1) Install app from Google Play - install link. 2) Copy your subscription in "My subscription" section 3) In Happ app click "Paste from clipboard" 4) Congratulations, subscription added! Clicking "speedometer" icon you can check connection speed with each location. Where value is lower - that location works better currently 5) Choose location and click connect.

install:windows.text: 1) Install app for Windows - install link 2) Copy your subscription in "My subscription" section 3) In Happ app click "Paste from clipboard" 4) Congratulations, subscription added! Clicking "speedometer" icon you can check connection speed with each location. Where value is lower - that location works better currently 5) Choose location and click connect.
